#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: simpleType StrokeDirectionEnum.

== Name ==

*[SStrokeDirectionEnum StrokeDirectionEnum]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
string
  |
  +--StrokeDirectionEnum (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			List of values to specify stroke direction in shot quality description.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	('left' | 'center' | 'right')

----
    <xs:simpleType name="StrokeDirectionEnum">  <xs:restriction base="xs:string">    <xs:enumeration value="left"/>    <xs:enumeration value="center"/>    <xs:enumeration value="right"/>  </xs:restriction></xs:simpleType>
----
